item.title: Your IMDb Profile, on your WordPress website
item.author: hacdias@gmail.com (Henrique Dias)
item.description: A few months ago, Lu√≠s Soares and I created a plugin for WordPress entirely dedicated to HackerRank. The main functionality of that plugin is to show a mini version of your HackerRank profile on your website as a widget. Now, we created a new one. Not for HackerRank, but for IMDb. Yes, you read correctly! For that amazing service which let us know more about (almost) any movie and serie. We called it IMDb Profile Widget!
